data.text:
LACUNA COIL's male vocalist Andrea Ferro is featured in a new interview with Bulgaria's Tangra Mega Rock, conducted on January 11th, discussing the band's new album, Dark Adrenaline. Check it out via the audio player below.

Ferro: "The last song of the album, 'My Spirit', is dedicated to Peter Steele of TYPE O NEGATIVE, who died a couple of years ago. H? was a big friend of ours because we toured together and have been friends for many years and the night we knew he’d died, Marco, the bass player wrote all the music that night, so it was a very spontaneous tribute to our friend."

Lacuna Coil

Lacuna Coil will release their sixth studio album, Dark Adrenaline, on January 24th, 2012 via Century Media Records. Fans can now pre-order a Deluxe Edition version of Dark the album via iTunes here, featuring the exclusive song 'Soul Inmate', five bonus tracks, the official video for 'Trip The Darkness' and a digital booklet.

Dark Adrenaline tracklisting:

'Trip The Darkness'

'Against You'

'Kill The Light'

'Give Me Something More'

'Upsidedown'

'End Of Time'

'I Don't Believe In Tomorrow'

'Intoxicated'

'The Army Inside'

'Losing My Religion'

'Fire'

'My Spirit'

Special Edition iTunes bonus material:

'Soul Inmate' (bonus track)

'Closer' (live on WCC)

'Heavens A Lie' (live on WCC)

'Within Me' (live on WCC)

'I Won’t Tell You' (live on KXFX)

'Spellbound' (on WBYR Second Visit)

'Trip The Darkness' (video)

Lacuna Coil are previewing the new track, 'Kill The Light', at their Facebook page, located here.

The band recently released their new video, for 'Trip The Darkness'. The song is the first single from the forthcoming Dark Adrenaline album.
